text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today is the Mile Championship, and<n>powerful
runners Biko Pegasus and Hishi<n>Akebono will be
running.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki is feeling nervous, but the<n>three of
them wish each other a good<n>race and do a
pre-race ritual together to<n>get ready.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With her spirits lifted, Fuji Kiseki is<n>ready for
anything. The race begins.
